price: (57) And when the son of Mary was presented as an example,[1443] immediately your people laughed aloud.
arabic: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدُّونَ
footnotes: [1443]- Of a creation of Allāh which is being worshipped along with Him.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walammā ḍuriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idhā qawmuka min'hu yaṣiddūna
